label: kind/upgrade-considerations
impact/highs
notes.text: If using edge-24.5.3 with the Linkerd CNI plugin on GKE, you must disable IPv6 or use edge-24.5.5 instead.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Removed the internal limit on the number of concurrent gRPC streams to the control plane, with available memory as the only constraint.
